constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 94 (Friday, May 28, 2021)]
[House]
[Pages H2678-H2679]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. DeLAURO:
H.R. 3580.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
[[Page H2679]]
Article I, Section 8, clause 3 provides Congress with the
power to ``regulate commerce with foreign nations, and among
the several states, and with the Indian tribes.''

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

title: Eviction Prevention Act of 2021
